transmission.translation[0].definitions[: the process of sending out electronic signals, messages etc, using radio, television, or other similar equipment
the process of sending or passing something from one person, place, or thing to another
something that is broadcast on television, radio etc
a live transmission of the tennis championship
the parts of a vehicle that take power from the engine to the wheels
transmission.translation[1].definitions[: the process of sending out electrical signals by radio, telephone, or similar equipment
This feature enables the machine to recognize whether an incoming call is a voice orfax transmission.
The system is intended to speed thetransmission of data.
